name: D. Select seven upper-division courses from an approved list.

child.name: Five of the courses must focus on one emphasis and two on a second emphasis chosen from the approved course lists on the Global Cultures website. Quarterly consultation with a faculty advisor is also required.

name: E. Select one additional upper- or lower-division course from an approved list.

child.name: The selected course must focus on the primary or secondary emphasis chosen from the approved course lists on the Global Cultures website.
